mapper.select: SELECT *,ud.id as udid,u.name as uname ,u.id as uid,m.name as mname FROM user_detail ud LEFT JOIN `user` u ON ud.user_id=u.id inner JOIN meeting m ON m.id=ud.meeting_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
SELECT *,ud.id as udid,u.name as uname ,u.id as uid ,m.name as mname FROM user_detail ud LEFT JOIN `user` u ON ud.user_id=u.id inner JOIN meeting m ON m.id=ud.meeting_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
